onboarding.step_1_description: Discover Biometric Wallet, the innovative wallet that frees you from having to remember security words. Access securely and quickly with your facial biometrics.
onboarding.step_2_description: Your biometrics will not be saved at any time, and it's only used to unlock the transfers between decentralized applications
onboarding.step_3_description: You will generate QR codes linked to your facial biometrics for quick and secure management of your wallets.

password_step.title: Add a password
password_step.description: This password is additional to your biometrics, to enhance the security of your encrypted wallet
password_step.agreement: I agree that Biometric Wallet can not recover this password, this is only used to encrypt your wallet

phrase_step.title: Biometric encryption
phrase_step.description: Your secret and security phrase consists of 12 or 24 words, necessary to access your wallet and funds.
phrase_step.description_2: Your phrase will be linked to your facial biometrics and password (if you have set one) and will be encrypted, generating a QR code.
phrase_step.subtitle: How is my phrase safeguarded?
phrase_step.description_3: Your secure phrase will be in an encrypted QR code linked to your facial biometrics (and password if you set one). The encryption is extremely secure because only your face can decrypt it, and live detection is required.
phrase_step.description_4: We use end-to-end encryption to transmit your hash (encryption over encryption) that is in the QR Code, then also to encrypt your face and afterwards decrypt it and perform a live detection, all of this happens to finally decrypt your initial hash stored in the QR Code, then authorize each of your transactions on your end.

biometric_instructions.title: Biometric instructions
biometric_instructions.instruction_1: Ensure Good Lighting and Clear Surroundings
biometric_instructions.instruction_2: Position Yourself in Front of the Camera
biometric_instructions.instruction_3: Place your face inside the oval

view_wallet.title: You have created your wallet successfully
view_wallet.description: These are the words of your security phrase, encrypted and safeguarded in the following QR code
view_wallet.description_2: You will always need your face as a main layer of security to access them.
view_wallet.qr_code_description: Remember to keep the QR code of your words safe to protect your account.

liveness.center_yor_face: Center your face on the screen
liveness.center_your_face_subtitle: Please make sure your face is centered
liveness.get_closer_subtitle: Please come a bit closer for better face recognition.

errors.person_already_set: Your registration has biometrics linked already
errors.Duplicated_person: Biometrics is being used into another record
errors.phone_or_email_is_not_unique: The phone or the email has been used already, try a different one
errors.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, please try again

step_zero.title: Import an existing wallet
step_zero.description: It allows you to transfer your digital assets from other platforms quickly and securely.
step_zero.description2: Our process ensures the privacy of your assets by preventing the exposure of your keys or recovery phrases.
step_zero.subtitle: What are the benefits?
step_zero.description3: Importing your wallet simplifies your cryptocurrency experience by avoiding the need to manage multiple accounts.
step_zero.description4: Easily access your funds on our platform without needing to use your recovery phrase.

step_one.title: Enter the recovery phrase
step_one.description: Please enter your recovery phrase below to validate and import your existing wallet.
step_one.paste_note: You can paste the entire secret recovery phrase in any field

qr_code_step.success_message: You have successfully imported your existing wallet
qr_code_step.description: Your security phrase and QR code are now linked to your facial biometrics. Keep the QR safe to protect your account.

unlock_wallet.title: Open an Existing Wallet
unlock_wallet.description: Open an existing wallet by entering its public address below:
unlock_wallet.upload_description: Or upload the image of your QR code to continue:
unlock_wallet.drag_drop_text: or drag and drop the file with .JPG or PNG extension here

password.title: This wallet requires a password
password.subtitle: Enter the password assigned to this wallet to complete the unlocking process.
password.label: Password
